chats.selected_model_will_now_be_used_for_new_: The selected model will now be used for new threads
chats.export_chat_description: Download your conversation in your preferred format. This includes all messages and metadata.

chats.export_mobile_not_supported_description: Export is currently only supported on web. Please use the web version to export your chats.

font_settings.title: Font Settings
font_settings.preview_message:
This is a **preview** message showing how your text will look.

It includes some `code` and multiple paragraphs to demonstrate spacing.
font_settings.preview_user_message: This is how your messages will look!

providers.title: Providers
providers.detailed_description: Providers provide different services to the app, such as text generation, image generation, search, and more.
providers.auto_detect_description: Automatically detect Ollama instances running on your network
providers.models_fetch_error: Could not fetch models from providers

form.sign_up_for_api_key: Click here to sign up for an {{provider}} API key

export.title: Data Export
export.description: Download or backup your conversation history
export.data_ownership: We believe in data ownership and transparency. Your conversations are yours to keep, analyze, or move to another platform. We provide multiple export formats to ensure maximum compatibility with other tools.
export.json_format: â€¢ JSON: Complete data structure with all metadata
export.yaml_format: â€¢ YAML: Human-readable format for easy inspection
export.export_note: Note: Exports include your conversation history, thread titles, and timestamps. No personal settings or API keys are included in the export.

ollama.introduction: Ollama is an open-source local server for hosting LLMs (large language models). To use Ollama with this app, follow these steps:
ollama.follow_instructions: Follow the installation instructions for your platform.
ollama.connect_description: Once Ollama is running and configured, use the "Scan for Ollama" button in the model selector to connect to your Ollama instance.

proxy.title: Proxy Settings
proxy.description: Used for web and desktop platforms to bypass CORS restrictions

models.no_compatible_model_description: This character requires a specific model that is not available.
